text: “Ndipo momwemonso tidawautsa kuti afunsane pakati pawo (zanthawi imene akhala ali chigonere). Adanena wonena mwa iwo: “Kodi mwakhala nthawi yotani muli mtulo?” Adati: “Takhala tsiku limodzi kapena gawo la tsiku.” (Ena) adati: “Mbuye wanu akudziwa kwambiri za nyengo imene mwakhala. Choncho mtumeni mmodzi wa inu ndindalama zanuzi za siliva kumudzi ndipo akayang’ane chakudya chake nchotani chomwe chili choyera bwino, ndikubwerera nacho chakudyacho; koma izi akachite mochenjera ndipo asamzindikiritse aliyense za inu.”
